oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait drawing of James M. Buchanan
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ervan, Ham
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Drawing of James McGill Buchanan. The work is in pencil, showing a smiling Buchanan in his late '80s. An inscription in the lower right reads "Ham Ervan '07".
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buchanan, James M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: May be reproduced for personal or educational purposes with attribution;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University
